articles.author: Shishir Gupta
articles.title: President Biden vows to defend Taiwan, shatters Xi’s unification dream - Hindustan Times
articles.description: US President Joe Biden’s emphatic words on Taiwan indicate that America is as much focused on China as it is on Russia in the context of the ongoing Ukraine war. | World News
articles.content: Chinese President Xi Jinpings dream of unifying the breakaway Republic Taiwan with the mainland may turn into a nightmare with President Joe Biden saying that US troops would defend Taipei in case of… [+2354 chars]

articles.title: MLB Roundup: AL wild-card race tightens as Blue Jays, Mariners lose - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Aaron Judge hit his 58th and 59th home runs of the season to move within two of Roger Maris’ American League record with 16 games remaining and lead the New York Yankees over the Milwaukee Brewers 12-8 on Sunday.
articles.content: MILWAUKEE (AP) Aaron Judge hit his 58th and 59th home runs of the season to move within two of Roger Maris American League record with 16 games remaining and lead the New York Yankees over the Milwau… [+10901 chars]

articles.title: At Scientific American: Webb Is Breaking the Big Bang Paradigm - Walter Bradley Center for Natural and Artificial Intelligence
articles.description: The Big Bang as a basic concept will doubtless survive. But much “settled science” seems to be getting a, perhaps needed, shakeup.
articles.content: Last weekend, we said whatever one thinks about the Big Bang, it was evident that the James Webb Space Telescope had shaken up astronopmy. At Scientific American, science writer JonathanOCallaghan se… [+3814 chars]
